meta.name: user-pack-template
meta.description: User Resource Pack template, all paths except assets-path is assets-path + x-path

sfx.example-sfx-id: path to sfx from assets-path + sfx-path

music.example-music-id: path to music from assets-path + music-path

textures.example-texture-id: path to texture from assets-path + textures-path

texture-id: INFO: Animation id format is: AnimationId.AnimationName if AnimationName is empty, for example 'animation5'
INFO: then animation id will be 'animation5' and AnimationName will be 'default'

example-animation.right.texture-id: for this animation id is 'example-animation' and name is 'right'

langs.en: en.json  path for this would be assets-path + langs-path so 'pack-folder/assets/langs/en.json'

pl.pack.example.info.1: There are 2 ways to make a translation, first is giving the path to the .json file
pl.pack.example.info.2: and second is typing it inside the file
pl.pack.example.info.3: This file has to be named data.json in order to work in your pack

fonts.example-font: main.ttf this font path would be assets-path + fonts-path so 'pack-folder/assets/fonts/main.ttf'
